page.title: 08Traditional games (1)
page.content: The most popular game in my village is 'French Skipping".It is mainly played by primary aged children.Each summer the children buy some elastic,about 3 metres,but the longer the better.You need 3 people at least to play the game.You tie the elastic into a loop then 2 people stand inside the elastic and stand well apart so that it becomes taut.One person stands inside with the elastic around their ankles.They then jump out of the elastic,with 1 leg over the right side and 1 over the left.The person then jumps back in and out,and this is repeated once more.The person then leaves all together and then runs up to it and puts 1 foot on either side as they go.They can then go on to play 'cross_overs','scissoring','thinsies' and 'widesies'.
